title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Heads for Second Consecutive Day of Over $1B Volume
description: Spot bitcoin ETFs had their best day since their debut on Monday, recording $2.4 billion in daily trading volume coupled with strong inflows.

title: Backpack crypto exchange's success is a testament to a maturing industry: Founder
description:
The crypto industry is at an inflection point following legacy bank failures and black swan events in the crypto space, according to the Mad Lads founder.

The success of the recently launched Backpack cryptocurrency exchange was a testament to a maturing crypto industry that demands more trustworthy exchanges, Armani Ferrante, the founder and CEO of Backpack, told Cointelegraph in an exclusive interview on Feb. 27.

“What we saw was ultimately just validation of the thesis that the world needs a new trustworthy crypto exchange,” he said.

Backpack surpassed $1 billion in 24-hour volume on Feb. 18, within four days of the launch of its trading pre-season. The exchange’s daily trading volume was down 6.4% to $296 million in the 24 hours leading up to 5:30 pm CET (4:30 pm UTC) on Feb. 27, according to CoinGecko data.

Read more

title: Uniswap DEX to launch web wallet extension
description:
"No more pop-ups. No more transaction windows," developers wrote.

Decentralized exchange (DEX) Uniswap is launching a web extension for its native wallet.

According to the Feb. 27 announcement, a waitlist is currently available for users who have claimed a uni.eth username. “We will be sharing access to the Uniswap Extension Beta in the order of username claims," the DEX said.

As with current self-custody wallets such as MetaMask, the Uniswap Wallet extension will allow users to send, receive, buy, and swap various tokens and altcoins directly from their web browsers. 

Read more

title: Avalanche Price Prediction 2024-2033: Time to Buy AVAX?
description: Avalanche Price Prediction 2024-2033 Here’s a thought: The value of an AVAX token is tied to the usefulness of the Avalanche platform. If people want to use the Avalanche platform, AVAX tokens rise in value. Conversely, the AVAX token won’t be as useful for an investment portfolio if the platform becomes obsolete or unpopular. title: Ethereum’s Dencun upgrade set to launch March 13
description: Ethereum announced that its Dencun upgrade has been successfully activated on all testnets and will be deployed on the Ethereum mainnet on Mar. 13th.

title: Spot Ethereum ETF issuers to meet with SEC in March
description: Multiple issuers are vying for a spot Ethereum ETF following the successful launch of spot BTC products, but SEC delays and commissioner comments signal a difficult road ahead.

title: Cryptocurrency exchange contract holdings hit record highs
description: Bitcoin contract holdings are now valued at $26.1 billion, while Ethereum contracts have climbed to $11.45 billion.
